formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: A LENGTH ERROR in Parse[23] occurs with the following message.

listitem.screen: Parse[23] fd←⍪0⌷⍉fm⌿ns ⍝ Depth of each function node

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: The fm is not expanded to the right size at this point, though we do expand it once a few lines above. The solution is to save the result of expanding the function mask when we do it to compute the fd function.
